prompts: Create a mechanical Pokemon with a shiny metallic body and bright blue accents.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles two interlocking gears, showcasing a steampunk aesthetic.
Generate a Pokemon with a unique design combining elements of machinery and nature.
Design a cute yet sturdy steel-type Pokemon that looks like a pair of cogs.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of teamwork and collaboration, represented by gears.
Show me a Pokemon with a rounded body and intricate details that reflect its mechanical nature.
Make a Pokemon that is both adorable and functional, inspired by clockwork mechanisms.
